mapper.sql: no, member_id AS memberId, member_pw AS memberPw, member_name AS memberName, member_age AS memberAge, member_area AS memberArea, member_hp AS hp, member_sex AS memberSex, token
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO member ( member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_age, member_area, member_hp, member_sex, token ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, PASSWORD(#{memberPw}), #{memberName}, #{memberAge}, #{memberArea}, #{hp}, #{memberSex}, #{token} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
